atten2.ptxt: Wear protective gloves. Sharp areas on the parts may injure your hands.

item.ptxt: Use the same procedure for the RH and LH sides.
The procedure listed below is for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE FRONT SEAT INNER BELT ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: w/ Driver Seat Belt Warning Light:

s3.ptxt: Detach the wire harness from the clamp.

s2.ptxt: Roll up over the front seat cushion cover LH.
Remove the nut and front seat inner belt assembly LH.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE FRONT SEAT INNER BELT ASSEMBLY RH (for Front Passenger Side)

s2.ptxt: w/ Passenger Seat Belt Warning Light:

s3.ptxt: Detach the 2 clamps and disconnect the connector.
Detach the wire harness from the clamp.

s2.ptxt: Roll up over the front seat cushion cover RH.
Remove the nut and front seat inner belt assembly RH.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE FRONT SEAT CUSHION COVER LH

s2.ptxt: Remove the cushion cover.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE FRONT SEAT CUSHION INNER SHIELD LH

s2.ptxt: Remove the 2 screws.
Detach the rear part of the inner shield in the order shown in the illustration, and then remove the cushion shield.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE VERTICAL SEAT ADJUSTER KNOB LH (w/ Vertical Adjuster)

s2.ptxt: Using a screwdriver, remove the snap ring as shown in the illustration.

atten4.ptxt: Tape the screwdriver tip before use.

s2.ptxt: Remove the knob.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE RECLINING ADJUSTER RELEASE HANDLE LH

s2.ptxt: Raise the reclining adjuster release handle to reveal the claw. Using a screwdriver, detach the claw and remove the release handle.

atten4.ptxt: Tape the screwdriver tip before use.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE FRONT SEAT CUSHION SHIELD LH

s2.ptxt: Remove the 2 screws.
Detach the rear part of the cushion shield in the order shown in the illustration, and then detach the claw and remove the cushion shield.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE SEATBACK SPRING

s2.ptxt: Remove the seatback spring.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE SEPARATE TYPE FRONT SEATBACK ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Remove the 4 bolts and seatback.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE SEPARATE TYPE FRONT SEATBACK COVER

s2.ptxt: Remove the hog rings from the wires of the seatback cover. Then roll up the seatback cover.
Remove the hog rings and detach the 2 straps of the seatback cover. Then roll up the seatback cover.
for Normal Seat:
Remove the hog rings from the center of the seatback pad and roll up the seatback cover.
for Leather Seat:
Remove the hog rings from the center of the seatback pad and roll up the seatback cover.
Remove the hog rings from the upper part of the seatback pad. Then roll up the seatback cover.
Detach the 4 claws and remove the 2 headrest supports.
Remove the hog rings and seatback cover.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE SEPARATE TYPE FRONT SEATBACK PAD

s2.ptxt: Remove the seatback pad.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE SEAT CUSHION COVER WITH PAD

s2.ptxt: w/ Occupant Detection Sensor:
Detach the wire harness clamp.
Detach the 2 hooks.
Detach the hooks in the hook area shown in the illustration.
Remove the hog rings and seat cushion cover with pad from the seat cushion frame.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE FRONT SEAT CUSHION PROTECTOR

s2.ptxt: Remove the 2 protectors.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE SEPARATE TYPE FRONT SEAT CUSHION COVER

s2.ptxt: for Normal Seat:
Remove the hog rings and seat cushion cover.
for Leather Seat:
Remove the hog rings and seat cushion cover.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE FRONT SEAT CUSHION FRAME SUB-ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Remove the 4 bolts and seat cushion frame.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE VERTICAL ADJUSTING SHAFT SUB-ASSEMBLY (w/ Vertical Adjuster)

s2.ptxt: Using a screwdriver, detach the seat spring from the reclining adjuster lower arm.

atten4.ptxt: Tape the screwdriver tip before use.

s2.ptxt: Using a screwdriver, spread apart the tabs that hold the spring, and then remove the spring.

atten4.ptxt: Tape the screwdriver tip before use.

s2.ptxt: Using a 6 mm socket hexagon wrench, remove the front seat No. 2 adjuster pin.
Temporarily install the vertical seat adjuster knob.
Turn the knob clockwise and move the gear of the vertical adjusting shaft to the position shown in the illustration.
Remove the vertical seat adjuster knob.
Using a screwdriver, remove the 2 E-rings and vertical adjusting shaft.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE SEAT TRACK HANDLE SUB-ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Detach the spring of the seat track in the order shown in the illustration. Then remove the handle.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE FRONT SEAT ADJUSTER ROD (w/ Vertical Adjuster)

s2.ptxt: Remove the 2 bolts and front seat adjuster rod.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE RECLINING ADJUSTER LOWER ARM SUB-ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: w/ Vertical Adjuster:
Using a T40 "TORX" socket wrench, remove the 2 "TORX" bolts and reclining adjuster lower arm.
w/o Vertical Adjuster:
Remove the 3 bolts and reclining adjuster lower arm.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE RECLINING ADJUSTER LOWER ARM SUB-ASSEMBLY RH

s2.ptxt: w/ Vertical Adjuster:

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedures described for the LH side.

s2.ptxt: w/o Vertical Adjuster:

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedures described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE FRONT SEAT CUSHION EDGE PROTECTOR LH

s2.ptxt: Remove the seat cushion edge protector.
